title: Bug 16377Dismissing zoomed fast view corrupts perspective layout
description: Build 20020517 imported a file (CopyFilesAndFoldersOperation.java) had sync already open as a fast view did a sync zoomed sync view by doubleclicking in its title bar reviewed changes dismissed sync view by clicking in shortcut bar the perspective went completely blank made sync view active again by clicking on icon in shortcut bar sync view still thinks it's maximized: its view menu has Restore enabled andMaximize disabled chose Restore the other views reappeared, but are now constrained to the 75% of theperspective occupied by the sync view; the 25% to the right is still blank converted sync view to regular view it occupied the 25% at right converted it back to fast view now back to a sane state
